page_content:
Thank you, join us!
In 2022, we continued to strengthen and build upon our 
global partnerships, collaborate with Akamai employees, and drive positive social change. Looking forward to 2023, we will continue serving our global communities by partnering with employees and community partners in meaningful ways to build momentum addressing our most challenging societal issues to drive lasting change.
Thank you to WilmerHale for their ongoing philanthropic 
pro bono legal support and guidance.Social / Foundation / 08 Thank you, join us!
